issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hi, 
I want to upload Image on Server from Android Device Gallery or Camera. I have done successfully upload. But I don't know. I am send the Image than this "Name" is different and on Server its name is different. 

In iOS working properly. this work Fine. Upload successfully and file name is also same. but,
In Android have some Problem. 
How I remove this problem. 
I give you a Question Link link
http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/150733/how-i-upload-image-on-server-in-jpg-or-png-format-in-titanium-android
Thanks

comments.body:
Hi,

Unfortunately this isn't a valid bug report -- we need a lot more information; most importantly we need a complete but simple reproducible test case that we can drop into an app.js and run. See this link about submitting bug reports: http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/latest/#!/guide/How_to_Submit_a_Bug_Report

I saw that you have some code in the Q&A question, but that's not enough - make sure it runs standalone in an app.js and then update this issue.

Also, the Android version you're using would be useful.

Thanks!
